amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities And Villages; Laws Applicable To More Than One And Less Than All Classes
amendatorysection.catchline: Hearing to create a district; call by petition.
amendatorysection.para: In the event that the city council has not acted to call a hearing to create a district as provided in sections 19-4015 to 19-4038, it shall do so when presented with a petition signed by the record owners of thirty percent of the assessable front footage in a business area or by the users of thirty percent of space in a business area.
